Yes, many paranormal investigators and ghost hunters have explored these haunted locations in Charleston, South Carolina, and have conducted investigations to try to capture evidence of supernatural activity. Several TV shows such as Ghost Hunters, Ghost Adventures, and Haunted Live have featured investigations in the most haunted locations in Charleston.

Some paranormal investigators and organizations that have looked into these places include South Carolina Paranormal Investigations, Paranormal Outlaws, and P.A.S.T. Paranormal. They have used various tools and techniques like EVPs, EMF detectors, and thermal imaging cameras to try to capture evidence of ghostly activity.

The results of these investigations vary, but many have reported experiencing eerie occurrences and capturing unusual images and sounds that can't be easily explained.
